root.name: The Catacomb Abyss
root.description: The Catacomb Abyss features the same player character that was in Catacomb 3-D. Unlike Catacomb 3-D, The Catacomb Abyss and the subsequent two sequels were not developed by id software. Catacomb Abyss is the first part in a trilogy of sequels, Catacomb Armageddon being the second part and Catacomb Apocalypse is the final part. Eventually, seemingly for the purpose of making them look more like stand-alone titles, the latter two were re-released under lamer tities; Armageddon became "Curse of the Catacombs" and Apocalypse became "Terror of the Catacombs".
